title: Small Kitchen Appliances for Serious Home Cooks
text:
Mansion Global has highlighted these products and services because we think readers will find them useful. We may earn a commission if you buy products through our links, but our recommendations are independent of any compensation that we may receive.

As every great chef knows, the art of a great meal is just as much about innate skill as it is some stellar machinery—especially in today’s busy world. After all, not every stick of butter can be churned. We combed the shelves to find some of the hottest, countertop-friendly home appliances every master cook needs.



June Intelligent Oven



For the sophisticated cook who gravitates toward high-tech design, the June Intelligent Ovendelivers seven appliances in one compact device. It’s a convection oven, air fryer, dehydrator, slow cooker, broiler, toaster and warming drawer all in one—saving space and time. Over 200 presets make cooking as easy as pressing a button and the device will do the rest. To make the ideal steak, for example, it automatically goes between roast, broil and bake functions. The spacious interior is big enough to fit a 12"-x-16" pan, a 10-pound turkey and 12-inch pizza. And, you can take the controls from anywhere over Wi-Fi by using the June app, which sets the time, temperature, presets and preferred doneness of every recipe. You can even watch live footage of your food cooking.



The June Intelligent Oven is available for $700.



KitchenAid Artisan Design Series Mixer with Glass Bowl



Without a KitchenAid Artisan Design Series Stand Mixer can you even call yourself a cook? The icon of kitchen appliances, this power tool combines style and substance. This one is Azure Blue, but it comes in an array of colors to suit your fancy (or match your cooking). Ten speeds, 15 optional attachments and a glass bowl with measurement markings, it mixes, kneads and whips all your ingredients to perfection. The power hub also fits optional attachments from food grinders to pasta makers and more. Even if you never use it, you’ll still look the part.



The KitchenAid Artisan Design Series Mixer with Glass Bowl is available for about $429.



Cuisinart 13 Cup Food Processor

Slice, chop, mix, grind and puree your way to ingredient perfection in this kitchen essential.



The Cuisinart Food Processor has precision blades to give you the ideal consistency every time. It comes with chopping, shredding and dicing blades, a fine and medium slicing disk, a dough blade and more. The gunmetal finish looks good anywhere you put it and it’s dishwasher safe so you needn’t worry about having to scrub sharp blades.

The Cuisinart 13 Cup Food Processor is available for $200.

Cuisinart CookFresh Digital Glass Steamer



Eating healthy just got easier with the Cuisinart CookFresh Digital Glass Steamer. The super-charged steam system features a five-liter glass cooking pot that’s big enough to cook vegetables, fish, chicken and rice for an entire family all at once. It administers steam from the top to the bottom, giving all your food an even preparation. There are five preprogrammed food settings for seafood, poultry, grains and vegetables as well as a manual mode. The LCD control panel is simple to operate, and there are stop, pause and reheat buttons to boot. You’ll never lose steam making healthy meals ever again.



The Cuisinart CookFresh Digital Glass Steamer is available for $150.



Philips XXL Digital Airfryer



The Philips XXL Digital Airfryer delivers the satisfying crunch of all your favorite fried foods but without all the fat and grease. Using heat circulation, little-to-no oil and Twin TurboStar technology, which takes out the fat from foods so it’s 90% less fattening than regular fried foods, the device cooks everything to crisp perfection. With a roomy build, it has the capability to cook whole chickens or up to six portions of fries for large crowds in a single bound. And, it’s not limited to just frying: You can bake, roast or grill. The Keep Warm mode lets you serve at any time; there’s a QuickClean basket outfitted with a nonstick mesh for easy cleaning, as well as presets to save your favorite settings.

The Philips XXL Digital Airfryer is available for $380.
